alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 14 at 2:45PM PDT until March 15 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5, south of Grenada, this includes Gazelle and Weed. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 2 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
